mapper.select:
SELECT b.* , a.HandoverStatus as handoverStatus, a.OperatorId as operatorId, (SELECT c.user_name FROM cf_user c , oms_operator_handover a WHERE c.user_id = a.OperatorId) as operatorName, (SELECT c.user_name FROM cf_user c , oms_operator_handover a WHERE c.user_id = a.HandoverId) as handoverName FROM oms_operator_handover a INNER JOIN oms_operator_handover_subform b ON a.ID=b.HandoverFormID INNER JOIN cf_user cu on cu.user_id = a.OperatorId
AND cu.org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.HandoverStatus = '5'

SELECT * FROM oms_cer_cancellate_license occl
AND occl.CREATE_USER = #{userId}
and occl.CREATE_TIME >= to_date(#{omsOperatorJBYWQueryParam.startTime,jdbcType=DATE},'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and occl.CREATE_TIME <= to_date(#{omsOperatorJBYWQueryParam.endTime,jdbcType=DATE},'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')

SELECT ocgt.*, rp.IDNUMBER_GB AS idnumber, rp.WORK_UNIT AS b0101, a.OPERATE_TIME AS endTime, rp.SEX AS sex, rp.POST AS postrank FROM oms_cer_get_task ocgt LEFT JOIN ( SELECT oce.GET_ID, oce.OPERATE_TIME FROM oms_cer_get_task ocgt LEFT JOIN oms_cer_exit_entry_repertory oce ON ocgt.ID = oce.GET_ID WHERE oce.STATUS = '1' ) a ON a.GET_ID = ocgt.id LEFT JOIN oms_reg_procpersoninfo rp ON ocgt.OMS_ID = rp.ID LEFT JOIN oms_cer_exit_entry_repertory oce ON ocgt.ID = oce.GET_ID
AND ocgt.GET_PEOPLE = #{userId}
and ocgt.GET_TIME >= to_date(#{omsOperatorJBYWQueryParam.startTime,jdbcType=DATE},'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and occl.GET_TIME <= to_date(#{omsOperatorJBYWQueryParam.endTime,jdbcType=DATE},'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')

SELECT * from oms_reg_revokeapply
AND oms_reg_revokeapply.CREATE_USER = #{userId}
and oms_reg_revokeapply.CREATE_DATE >= to_date(#{omsOperatorJBYWQueryParam.startTime,jdbcType=DATE},'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and oms_reg_revokeapply.CREATE_DATE <= to_date(#{omsOperatorJBYWQueryParam.endTime,jdbcType=DATE},'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')

select opa.*, CONCAT(IFNULL(orp.SURNAME,''),IFNULL(orp.NAME,'')) as name, orp.BIRTH_DATE as birthDate, orp.SEX as sex, orp.IDNUMBER_GB as idnumber, orp.REGISTE_RESIDENCE as registeResidence, orp.WORK_UNIT as b0101, orp.IDENTITY as identifyType from oms_pri_apply opa left join oms_reg_procpersoninfo orp on opa.PROCPERSON_ID = orp.ID
AND opa.CREATE_USER = #{userId}
and opa.ABROAD_TIME >= to_date(#{omsOperatorJBYWQueryParam.startTime,jdbcType=DATE},'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and opa.ABROAD_TIME <= to_date(#{omsOperatorJBYWQueryParam.endTime,jdbcType=DATE},'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')

select pa.*, rp.SEX as sex, CONCAT(IFNULL(rp.SURNAME,''),IFNULL(rp.NAME,'')) as name, rp.IDNUMBER_GB as idnumber, rp.WORK_UNIT as b0101, rp.POST as postrank from oms_pri_delay_apply pa LEFT JOIN oms_reg_procpersoninfo rp on pa.PROCPERSON_ID = rp.ID
AND pa.CREATE_USER = #{userId}
and pa.CREATE_TIME >= to_date(#{omsOperatorJBYWQueryParam.startTime,jdbcType=DATE},'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and pa.CREATE_TIME <= to_date(#{omsOperatorJBYWQueryParam.endTime,jdbcType=DATE},'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
mapper.insert: insert into oms_operator_handover (ID, OperatorId, HandoverId, HandoverTime, HandoverStatus) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{handoverid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{handovertime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{handoverstatus,jdbcType=CHAR})

insert into oms_operator_handover
ID,
OperatorId,
HandoverId,
HandoverTime,
HandoverStatus,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{operatorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{handoverid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{handovertime,jdbcType=DATE},
#{handoverstatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
mapper.update:
update oms_operator_handover
OperatorId = #{operatorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HandoverId = #{handoverid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HandoverTime = #{handovertime,jdbcType=DATE},
HandoverStatus = #{handoverstatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
